title: Champion Reveal: Urgot the Dreadnaught
body: Urgot has returned to the rift and he's got shotgun knees (but you knew that)!

replies.body:
That ultimate is terrifying....I freakin' LOVE it! 

I was never too big an Urgot fan admittedly, but wow...I think that might have to change. He literally looks like a walking fortress of death. Rapid-fire shotgun knees FTW!
He is a walking Dreadnought :)

> [{quoted}](name=Reav3,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4TI5dZZb,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-07-07T19:14:36.614+0000)
>
> He is a walking Dreadnaught :)

I dread the downvotes, but maybe that's all for naught.

It's "Dreadnought."  The article has it right :)
Good Catch! Editing

I know its a bit early reav but when can we expect you to announce the rework after eve(cough{{champion:82}} )
PS: i have spare Rings of Power if you can leak a few minor details :)
Aatrox was already announced for a rework after Eve. But it isn't a full VGU, just a GU so we can expect it to take a little less time.

aatrox is after eve

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202294884-Champion-Update-Schedule

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-CelowzSYyZ4/WV_YrvBa2JI/AAAAAAAAom8/tgswnZ_oSGgGnSD05fsAKyUVDOwHMD3awCLcBGAs/s640/battlecast-wallpaper1920X1080.jpg

We have a literal tank now
This looks like a protoss dragoon
Looks more like an Immortal to me. Dragoons don't really have an upper body.

A weapon to surpass Metal Gear!

######[I'm gonna keep making this joke for a while](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/YKZGmFEH-that-urgot-rework-truly-is)
Could you give me some insight as to the decision to veer crabgot away from his gross movie-monsterness? I was a big user of that skin because it was hilariously disgusting.

Probably because the change of his overall theme. He went from being kind of a joke to being a badass, walking tank of destruction. Having a skin like the old Crabgot simply wouldn't fit that theme, so, they moved it to a more Kaiju style skin.
Lots of serious champs have goofy skins.

When is he coming out
also if we own urgot already is this a free upgrade or do we have to buy him again??{{champion:6}}

Every champion update has been free so far.

So, yes.
Urgot will still be yours.
And any skins you own for him will remain.
Your Champion Mastery points on him will also stay there.

{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}} 

_**Almighty.**_
God, He's fucking brutal lol

God dammit Riot, you keep reeling me back into this game with awesome shit like this.... and I love it when you do!

You've somehow made the shotgun knee thing work, kept some parts of his old identity like his ugliness, but more importantly **gave him an identity of this walking death dreadnought motherfucker that when you think you escaped his onslaught of knee blasts he literally reels you in for the kill**

I love it. I Love It. I LOVE IT! (really wish i had access to PBE right now though when he hits)

Hehâ€¦ reeling me back in.  

'Cuz, 'cuz it's Urgot's ult.
######heh heh
Urgot reveal on **7**/**7**/1**7**. Talk about jackpot.

Hey I've big fan of Urgot for a long time and I still play him so thanks for keeping him as a Range/Tank and also some what keeping the lock on, but question...

How many reworks of Urgot did you all try before choosing this form and for the most part what was the biggest problem did you have on reworking him, if I may ask? 

Plz Rito notice me.
Rito pls notice me noticing this guy
Plz notice Rito noticing Mcsquzzy.
Plz notice WAAAAAAAAAAAAAGH noticing Rito noticing Mcsquzzy
_Noticed_
Reav3, i'm curious, what drew inspiration on Crabgot's splash and appearance?
https://youtu.be/ypHYz2aCUJ0  maybe?

Fucking hell yes.

I now must buy Mecha Aatrox, just to lane against Crabgots.
Just so were clear he gets 2 slows, a fear, a pull, and a resistance to slows while gaining a shield...well at least they didnt give another champ invulnerability frames, kudos on that
They gave his ult target invincibility frames, if that means anything.

My personal thoughts as a Urgot main:

Not a fan of the overall reduced range, but I understand that it had to go. I like the overall thematics however, and this kit does emulate how a tank should be (like, the threads and cannon type, not the damage sponge kind).

Save for that Ult which IS FUCKING AWESOME AND I AM RAMROD STIFF ABOUT IT, FUCKING YES THAT IS A ULT WORTHY OF THE HEADSMAN PRIDE.
Hey, look! A constructive comment! What do you think about the new version of the lock-on mechanism?

He's ah coming. 
Can you hear him? 
Those gears and gyros, 
clicking and whirling like the Devil himself!
https://i.imgur.com/3fNuMIv.gif

warning we got a Category V Kaiju, codename: Crabgot!

SEND IN MECHA AATROX IMMEDIATELY!!!
The upvotes on this thread, the constant threads about Urgot hype, and the upvotes on the reddit thread for this say otherwise.
dont know if it was answered but will boots of swiftness reduce the slow on purge?
Most likely. Swifties reduce other self slows like when Varus is charging his Q.
definitely the worst rework so far by a huge margin.
How so? It looks incredibly unique from both a gameplay and art perspective. His passive is especially distinct, never seen anything like it in League

it'd be fine if he were a new champion, i just don't like that urgot had to be removed from the game to make room for new "urgot". i actually liked urgot and it's a complete betrayal of his core identity. imagine if the next rework were tank twitch.
What do you believe to be urgots core identity? I thought it was always an inescapable monstrosity that would mow you down at a range.
and now he has very little range. his very long range was a part of who he was gameplay-wise

True. I think that riot probably had to make a compromise with urgot because he was a tank like marksman which meant that riot could have either made urgot a bulky adc or a slightly ranged jugger abd they went the jugger route because a bulky adc would probably be really hard to balance without just killing.

As a huge Urgot fan I approve of this rework.  I do prefer his old design and splashes, but the new ones are still great, with the exception of Crabgot.  I don't like how Riot left behind his classic movie monster look, he looks like a Jaeger now.

Jaeger = robot
Kaiju = monster

get your media right m8

> [{quoted}](name=Moonboy65,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4TI5dZZb,comment-id=001c0000,timestamp=2017-07-07T20:23:40.195+0000)
>
> Jaeger = robot
> Kaiju = monster
> 
> get your media right m8

I know the difference, the new Crabgot is a giant robot which would qualify him more as a Jaeger than a Kaiju.

how exactly does he look like a robot?

nice logic m8

> [{quoted}](name=Moonboy65,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=4TI5dZZb,comment-id=001c000000000000,timestamp=2017-07-08T01:39:39.521+0000)
>
> how exactly does he look like a robot?
> 
> nice logic m8

Yeah after looking at it more it is more like a Pacific Rim style Kaiju.  At first glance the splash looked like its shell was made out of metal so I thought it was a Crab-Jaeger.
